item.description:

item.title: 甲骨文公司因投标面临被南非政府列入黑名单的风险
item.description: 南非为打击腐败和滥用公共资金而成立的特别调查组要求国家财政部禁止甲骨文公司与政府开展业务，因为该调查组认为甲骨文公司的招标存在缺陷。【原文：South Africa’s Special Investigation Unit, established to tackle corruption and the misuse of public funds, asked the National Treasury to bar Oracle Corp. from doing business with the government because of what it says was a flawed tender.】

item.title: 卢拉推动经济增长，巴西寻求促进房地产市场发展
item.description: 在巴西总统路易斯-伊纳西奥-卢拉-达席尔瓦（Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva）要求促进经济增长的压力下，巴西正准备采取措施促进本国房地产市场的发展。【原文：Brazil is readying measures to boost the country’s real estate market amid pressure from President Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva to fuel economic growth.】

item.title: 拜耳支持的 Boundless Bio 在 1 亿美元首次公开募股后下跌 9
item.description: 拜耳公司（Bayer AG）是一家癌症治疗药生产商，其最大的投资者之一是拜耳公司，该公司在美国首次公开募股募集到 1 亿美元后，股价下跌了 9%。【原文：Shares of Boundless Bio Inc., a cancer therapeutics maker that counts Bayer AG among its largest investors, fell 9% after raising $100 million in a US initial public offering.】

item.title: 巴西希望利用 Eletrobras 资金降低电费
item.description: 据一位熟悉该计划的官员透露，路易斯-伊纳西奥-卢拉-达席尔瓦总统打算在下周颁布一项临时措施，旨在通过将巴西最大的发电公司所欠电费证券化来降低巴西的电价。【原文：President Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva intends to issue a provisional measure next week designed to lower Brazil’s electricity prices through the securitization of payments owed by the country’s largest power generation company, according to an official familiar with the plan.】

item.title: 巴拿马信用评级在矿难中被惠誉下调至 "垃圾 "级
item.description: 惠誉国际评级公司（Fitch Ratings）取消了巴拿马的投资级信用评级，原因是巴拿马去年关闭了一个重要的铜矿，加剧了该国的财政忧虑，并有可能破坏经济增长前景。【原文：Fitch Ratings stripped Panama of its investment-grade credit rating as the closure of a key copper mine last year adds to the country’s fiscal worries and risks undermining growth prospects.】

item.title: 运营商称德国煤电厂保持待机成本过高
item.description: 德国一家煤电厂运营商警告说，按照国家监管机构的要求，让发电站处于待机状态以帮助维持未来几年的电力供应是无利可图的。【原文：A coal plant operator in Germany has warned that it’s unprofitable to put power stations on standby to help keep the lights on for the next few years, as requested by the nation’s regulator.】

item.title: 奇才和首都体育馆交易因 12 亿美元的小额贷款出售而得以缓解
item.description: 去年的再融资降低了华盛顿特区的利息支出，使其有能力为国家篮球协会的奇才队和国家冰球联盟的首都队提供超过 5 亿美元的新场馆。【原文：Washington, D.C.’s ability to offer the National Basketball Association’s Wizards and the National Hockey League’s Capitals more than $500 million for a new arena was eased by a refinancing last year that cut its interest bills.】

item.title: 月度意外盈余后南非兰特减少损失
item.description: 兰特扭转了早些时候的跌势，因为数据显示政府 2 月份意外录得预算盈余，这是自 7 月份以来的第二次盈余。【原文：The rand reversed earlier losses after data showed the government unexpectedly recorded a budget surplus in February, only the second positive reading since July.】

item.title: 穆迪下调评级后，S&P 下调法国 Altice 公司评级
item.description: S&P全球评级公司下调了Altice France SA的信用评级，进一步增加了持有该债务的抵押贷款义务的压力。【原文：S&P Global Ratings lowered Altice France SA’s credit rating, adding further pressure on the collateralized loan obligations holding the debt.】

item.title: 法国电力集团与核燃料生产商谈判，希望绕过俄罗斯
item.description: 法国电力公司（Electricite de France SA）正在与奥拉诺公司（Orano SA）和西屋电气公司（Westinghouse Electric Co.【原文：Electricite de France SA is in talks with Orano SA and Westinghouse Electric Co. over the construction of a nuclear facility in Western Europe that would help the company to bypass Russia for supplies of reprocessed fuel used in France’s power stations.】

item.title: Grindr 首次获得买入评级，Cowen 认为其增长速度超过 Tinder 所有者
item.description: 华尔街首家将 Grindr Inc. 评为 "买入 "股票的公司称，Grindr Inc. 专注于 LGBTQ+ 社区，其收入增长有望快于约会应用行业巨头 Match Group Inc.【原文：Grindr Inc.’s focus on the LGBTQ+ community promises faster revenue growth than the dating app industry titans, Match Group Inc. and Bumble Inc., according to the first Wall Street firm to rate the stock a buy.】

item.description: 家得宝公司（Home Depot Inc.【原文：Home Depot Inc. told investors it expects to take on $12.5 billion of debt to help fund its planned purchase of building-products distributor SRS Distribution Inc.】

item.title: 交易商 Trafigura 承认在巴西贿赂石油长达十年之久
item.description: 特拉菲古拉集团（Trafigura Group）承认在巴西犯有十年贿赂罪，这是一连串腐败案件中的最新一起，暴露了全球最大大宗商品贸易商内部普遍存在的腐败文化。【原文：Trafigura Group pleaded guilty to a decade of bribery in Brazil, in the latest in a string of corruption cases that have exposed a culture of widespread corruption inside the world’s biggest commodity traders.】

item.title: 沙特阿拉伯为项目销售绿色债券的目标创历史新高
item.description: 沙特阿拉伯政府可能会首次开始出售绿色债券，因为这个世界上最大的石油出口国正寻求为环保项目筹集资金，并摆脱作为其经济支柱的化石燃料。【原文：Saudi Arabia’s government may start selling green bonds for the first time as the world’s biggest oil exporter seeks to raise money for environmentally-friendly projects and a transition away from fossil fuels that are the backbone of its economy.】

item.title: 世界银行为新兴市场金融解锁秘密数据
item.description: 世界银行集团公布了一批专有数据，称这些数据可为投资者提供更好地评估风险所需的工具，从而有助于促进对新兴市场的投资。【原文：World Bank Group has published a trove of proprietary data it says can help boost investment in emerging markets by providing investors with the tools they need to better assess risk.】

item.title: 据说 Neoen 正在研究通过出售澳大利亚股权筹集 10 亿欧元资金
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，法国可再生能源开发商 Neoen SA 正在考虑出售其澳大利亚子公司 30% 的股份，以筹集超过 10 亿欧元（11 亿美元）的资金，资助其在澳大利亚的发展。【原文：French renewable energy developer Neoen SA is considering selling a 30% stake in its Australian unit to raise more than €1 billion ($1.1 billion) to fund its growth in the country, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 特朗普的媒体选择成本高昂 比尔-格罗斯想卖掉它们
item.description: 与前总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的媒体公司相关的期权交易正吸引着备忘录股票交易者和华尔街专业人士。在这份名单中，还有曾经的 "债券大王 "比尔-格罗斯（Bill Gross）。【原文：Trading options tied to former president Donald Trump’s media company is attracting meme-stock traders and Wall Street professionals. Add to that list erstwhile “Bond King” Bill Gross.】

item.title: 埃及考虑进口液化天然气以避免夏季高温时出现短缺
item.description: 埃及正在考虑购买液化天然气，以避免今年夏天出现燃料短缺，但红海地区的暴力事件带来了挑战。【原文：Egypt is looking at buying liquefied natural gas to stave off fuel shortages this summer, but violence in the Red Sea region is posing a challenge.】

item.title: 肯尼亚计划发行价值 5 亿美元的熊猫债券，为下期预算提供资金
item.description: 据熟悉肯尼亚计划的人士透露，肯尼亚计划通过在中国首次出售债券筹集 5 亿美元，以寻求扩大来自国外的资金来源。【原文：Kenya plans to raise $500 million through a debut bond sale in China as it seeks to widen its funding pool from foreign sources, according to people familiar with the plans.】

item.title: 美国特使希望推动更多 Blackstone、KKR 投资流入印度
item.description: 美国驻印度大使表示，他希望促进美国养老基金和私募股权公司（如 KKR & Co. 和 Blackstone Inc.【原文：The US ambassador to India said he wants to boost investment from American pension funds and private equity firms like KKR & Co. and Blackstone Inc. into the South Asian economy to take advantage of its rapid growth.】

item.title: 特朗普当选几率上升，太阳能股低迷延至 2024 年
item.description: 已经受到价格下跌、关税和借贷成本上升打击的太阳能股票，在未来几个月内还将面临另一个潜在威胁：唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）。【原文：Solar stocks, already battered by falling prices, tariffs and rising borrowing costs face another potential threat over the coming months: Donald Trump.】

item.title: 班克曼-弗里德告诉法官他 "对所发生的事情感到抱歉"。
item.description: FTX 联合创始人山姆-班克曼-弗里德（Sam Bankman-Fried）对即将对他的欺诈案作出判决的联邦法官说，他 "很抱歉"。【原文：FTX co-founder Sam Bankman-Fried told the federal judge about to sentence him in his fraud case that he was “sorry.”】

item.title: 阿达尼能源公司正在与银行洽谈借款事宜，金额最高可达 6 亿美元
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，阿达尼能源解决方案有限公司（Adani Energy Solutions Ltd. ）正在寻求高达 6 亿美元的信贷融资，以资助供电智能电表项目。【原文：Adani Energy Solutions Ltd. is seeking a credit facility for as much as $600 million to fund smart meter projects for electricity supply, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 微策略公司的比特币赌注使其市值超过近一半的 S&P 500 公司
item.description: 想知道今年的加密货币涨势有多疯狂吗？一家软件制造商也被认为是某种比特币对冲基金，它现在的股票市值比 S&P 500 指数中近一半的公司都要高。【原文：Want a sense of how wild this year’s crypto rally has become: A software maker that’s also considered a Bitcoin hedge fund of sorts now has a stock market capitalization that’s higher than nearly half of the companies in the S&P 500 Index.】

item.title: 2023 年乌克兰经济增长 5.3%，不畏俄罗斯攻击
item.description: 乌克兰去年经济增长了 5.3%，因为它重新夺回了对黑海出口走廊的控制权，并在俄罗斯导弹和无人机持续袭击的情况下收获了大丰收。【原文：Ukraine’s economy grew 5.3% last year as it reasserted control of a Black Sea export corridor and harvested a bumper crop despite continued Russian missile and drone attacks.】

item.title: 巴基斯坦经济增长因创纪录的利率而减弱
item.description: 在创纪录的高利率影响了企业并降低了消费需求之后，巴基斯坦第二财政季度的经济增长有所减弱。【原文：Pakistan’s economic growth weakened in the fiscal second quarter after record high interest rates impacted businesses and reduced consumer demand.】

item.title: 可可的持续上涨正将市场推向爆发点
item.description: 全球可可市场在前所未有的短缺压力下举步维艰。【原文：The global cocoa market is buckling under the strain of unprecedented shortages.】

item.title: 马拉维药用大麻品种合法化
item.description: 马拉维立法者将一种药效极强的本地大麻品种的种植合法化，用于工业和医疗用途。【原文：Malawian legislators legalized the cultivation of a highly potent local variety of cannabis for industrial and medicinal use.】
